name: G-Mode Archives 15: Chura-jima Kurashi
summary:
Where there is sky and sea, there is a story. Experience the "slow life" of your dreams on a southern island!

It is a game where you can simulate life on the fictional island "Churajima" reminiscent of a remote island in Okinawa.

"I want to be wrapped in the pleasant sound of waves and look at the wide sky on the sandy beach ..."
Such a longing "slow life" is waiting for you.

Interact with village residents and tourists, sea fishing, shamisen, hub extermination, Okinawan cuisine, etc.
You are free to enjoy the activities unique to the southern island and do anything.
You can walk around the island and have various experiences.

Why don't you relax in "Chura Island" with the main character who moved because he was tired of living in the city?
